name: La Sportiva Boulder X Approach Shoes - Men's
description: Stout shoes to suit involved approaches and convoluted descents. The Boulder X shoes have rough-out leather uppers, double stitched seams, and full rubber rands for purchase on loose scree and fast travel over talus fields.Uppers are durable rough-out leather with double stitched seams.To-the-toe patented lacing harness wraps around the heel for a secure and precise fit.Sticky slingshot rubber rand provides protection while scrambling.Midsoles are EVA, with closed-cell microcellular rubber for shock absorption and durability.Polypropylene lasting boards provide rigidity and support for rough terrain.Outsoles are sticky Vibram® approach compound, with offset slanting lugs for exceptional traction and grip over rocky terrain.Front edging platforms add control while smearing and edging.
